title: Language Marketplace
author: ''
date: '2022-10-25'
slug: language_marketplace
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $601.8K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Language Marketplace. The average
  contract duration was 1.02 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $68.8K. The longest
  contract was 4 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $781.1K.
lookup_name: 'LANGUAGE MARKETPLACE'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '601.8K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '73'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '16'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '22%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '178%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.44'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '1.8M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.02'
s421_mean_contract_value: '68.8K'
s425_max_duration: '4'
s422_max_contract_value: '781.1K'
---
